title: Lesson 1 : Hiragana a i u e o
text:
Welcome, we are going to start learning the Kana with the Hiragana.
Let's start with the first 5 characters of 'simple' Hiragana (Gojuon): あ　い　う　え　お

title: Lesson 2 : Hiragana a i u e o
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: あ　い　う　え　お

title: Lesson 3 : Hiragana ka ki ku ke ko
text: The last time we saw the first 5 letters, we will now learn the next 5 characters: か き く け こ

title: Lesson 4 : Hiragana ka ki ku ke ko
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: か き く け こ

title: Lesson 5 : Hiragana sa shi su se so
text: Do you remember the first 10 characters? Let's continue with 5 more Hiragana: さ し す せ そ

title: Lesson 6 : Hiragana sa shi su se so
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: さ し す せ そ

title: Lesson 7 : Hiragana ta chi tsu te to
text: We have already learned 15 characters in Hiragana. Let's continue with 5 more characters: た ち つ て と

title: Lesson 8 : Hiragana ta chi tsu te to
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: た ち つ て と

title: Lesson 9 : Hiragana na ni nu ne no
text: Do you remember the first 20 Hiragana? Here are 5 more caractères: な に ぬ ね の

title: Lesson 10 : Hiragana na ni nu ne no
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: な に ぬ ね の

title: Lesson 11 : Hiragana ha hi fu he ho
text:
We have seen more than half of the 46 'simple' Hiragana. Don't hesitate to review previous lessons.
Let's continue with 5 new characters: は ひ ふ へ ほ

title: Lesson 12 : Hiragana ha hi fu he ho
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: は ひ ふ へ ほ

title: Lesson 13 : Hiragana ma mi mu me mo
text: Courage! Here are 5 new characters: ま み む め も

title: Lesson 14 : Hiragana ma mi mu me mo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ま み む め も

title: Lesson 15 : Hiragana ya yu yo
text:
This time, there are only three Hiragana, they starting with 'y'.
Let's see that with this lesson: や ゆ よ

title: Lesson 16 : Hiragana ya yu yo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: や ゆ よ

title: Lesson 17 : Hiragana ra ri ru re ro
text: You've learned some Hiragana! Let's continue with hiraganas starting with 'r': ら り る れ ろ

title: Lesson 18 : Hiragana ra ri ru re ro
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ら り る れ ろ

title: Lesson 19 : Hiragana wa (w)o n
text: Here are last 3 characters of the 46 Gojuon Hiragana: わ を ん

title: Lesson 20 : Hiragana wa (w)o n
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: わ を ん

title: Lesson 21 : Hiragana ga gi gu ge go
text:
We are done with 'simple' Hiragana (Gojuon).
Continue with the first 5 characters of ((Han)dakuon) Hiragana.
In addition they have two small lines (Dakuten).
Here k- becomes g-: が ぎ ぐ げ ご

title: Lesson 22 : Hiragana ga gi gu ge go
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: が ぎ ぐ げ ご

title: Lesson 23 : Hiragana za ji zu ze zo
text:
Let's continue with 5 more (Han)dakuon characters.
This time s- becomes z-: ざ じ ず ぜ ぞ

title: Lesson 24 : Hiragana za ji zu ze zo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ざ じ ず ぜ ぞ

title: Lesson 25 : Hiragana da ji zu de do
text:
You have learned 10 new (Han)dakuon characters, let's continue with the next 5 characters.
This time t- becomes d-.
Also, pay attention to じ(ji) and ぢ(ji*). And also to ず(zu) and づ(zu*): だ ぢ づ で ど

title: Lesson 26 : Hiragana da ji zu de do
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: だ ぢ づ で ど

title: Lesson 27 : Hiragana ba bi bu be bo
text:
Alright, let's continue with 5 new characters.
This time h- becomes b- with 'Dakuten' (small lines): ば び ぶ べ ぼ

title: Lesson 28 : Hiragana ba bi bu be bo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ば び ぶ べ ぼ

title: Lesson 29 : Hiragana pa pi pu pe po
text: Here are the last 5 (Han)Dakuon Hiragana. This time the h- become p- with 'Handakuten' (small circle): ぱ ぴ ぷ ぺ ぽ

title: Lesson 30 : Hiragana pa pi pu pe po
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ぱ ぴ ぷ ぺ ぽ

title: Lesson 31 : Hiragana kya kyu kyo
text:
We have finished learning 'simple' (Gojuon) and (Han)dakuon Hiragana.
Now we are going to see 'Yoon' Hiragana.
Here are the first 3 characters.
These, are associations of き(ki) with Hiragana や(ya), ゆ(yu) and よ(yo): きゃ　きゅ　きょ

title: Lesson 32 : Hiragana kya kyu kyo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: きゃ　きゅ　きょ

title: Lesson 33 : Hiragana sha shu sho
text:
New lesson, new caracters.
Here are 3 additional characters to learn.
These, are associations of し(shi) with Hiragana や(ya), ゆ(yu) and よ(yo): しゃ しゅ しょ

title: Lesson 34 : Hiragana sha shu sho
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: しゃ しゅ しょ

title: Lesson 35 : Hiragana cha chu cho
text:
Do you remember all the previous Hiragana?
Here are 3 additional characters to learn.
These, are associations of hiragana ち(chi) with hiragana や(ya), ゆ(yu) and よ(yo): ちゃ ちゅ ちょ

title: Lesson 36 : Hiragana cha chu cho
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ちゃ ちゅ ちょ

title: Lesson 37 : Hiragana nya nyu nyo
text:
Let's keep learning, here are the next characters.
These, are associations of Hiragana に(ni) with Hiragana や(ya), ゆ(yu) and よ(yo): にゃ にゅ にょ

title: Lesson 38 : Hiragana nya nyu nyo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: にゃ にゅ にょ

title: Lesson 39 : Hiragana hya hyu hyo
text:
You learned 12 Yoon. Continue with the following Hiragana.
These, are associations of hiragana ひ(hi) with hiragana や(ya), ゆ(yu) and よ(yo): ひゃ ひゅ ひょ

title: Lesson 40 : Hiragana hya hyu hyo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ひゃ ひゅ ひょ

title: Lesson 41 : Hiragana mya myu myo
text:
Let's continue with the following Hiragana.
These, are associations of hiragana ひ(hi) with hiragana や(ya), ゆ(yu) and よ(yo): みゃ みゅ みょ

title: Lesson 42 : Hiragana mya myu myo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: みゃ みゅ みょ

title: Lesson 43 : Hiragana rya ryu ryo
text:
Keep learning Hiragana! Here are the next 3.
These, are associations of Hiragana り(ri) with Hiragana や(ya), ゆ(yu) and よ(yo): りゃ りゅ りょ

title: Lesson 44 : Hiragana rya ryu ryo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: りゃ りゅ りょ

title: Lesson 45 : Hiragana gya gyu gyo
text:
You learned 21 Yoon, keep going.
These, are associations of Hiragana ぎ(gi) with Hiragana や(ya), ゆ(yu) and よ(yo): ぎゃ ぎゅ ぎょ

title: Lesson 46 : Hiragana gya gyu gyo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ぎゃ ぎゅ ぎょ

title: Lesson 47 : Hiragana ja ju jo
text:
New lesson with new characters.
These, are associations of Hiragana じ(ji) with Hiragana や(ya), ゆ(yu) and よ(yo): じゃ じゅ じょ

title: Lesson 48 : Hiragana ja ju jo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: じゃ じゅ じょ

title: Lesson 49 : Hiragana bya byu byo
text:
You have seen almost all the Hiragana. Let's continue with 3 more characters.
These, are associations of Hiragana び(bi) with Hiragana や(ya), ゆ(yu) and よ(yo): びゃ びゅ びょ

title: Lesson 50 : Hiragana bya byu byo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: びゃ びゅ びょ

title: Lesson 51 : Hiragana pya pyu pyo
text:
Here is the last Hiragana.
These, are associations of Hiragana ぴ(pi) with Hiragana や(ya), ゆ(yu) and よ(yo): ぴゃ ぴゅ ぴょ

title: Lesson 52 : Hiragana pya pyu pyo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson, after you can take quizzes to practice Hiragana: ぴゃ ぴゅ ぴょ

title: Lesson 53 : Katakana a i u e o
text:
Hello, we are going to start learning the Katakana.
Let's start with the first 5 characters of 'simple' Katakanas (Gojuon): ア イ ウ エ オ

title: Lesson 54 : Katakana a i u e o
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ア イ ウ エ オ

title: Lesson 55 : Katakana ka ki ku ke ko
text: The last time we saw the first 5 letters of Katakana, we will now learn the next 5 characters: カ キ ク ケ コ

title: Lesson 56 : Katakana ka ki ku ke ko
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: カ キ ク ケ コ

title: Lesson 57 : Katakana sa shi su se so
text: Do you remember the first 10 characters? Let's continue with 5 more characters: サ シ ス セ ソ

title: Lesson 58 : Katakana sa shi su se so
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: サ シ ス セ ソ

title: Lesson 59 : Katakana ta chi tsu te to
text: We have already learned 15 characters Katakana. Let's continue with 5 more characters: タ チ ツ テ ト

title: Lesson 60 : Katakana ta chi tsu te to
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: タ チ ツ テ ト

title: Lesson 61 : Katakana na ni nu ne no
text: Do you remember the first 20 characters of Katakana? If not, do not hesitate to revise. Let’s continue with 5 more Kana: ナ ニ ヌ ネ ノ

title: Lesson 62 : Katakana na ni nu ne no
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ナ ニ ヌ ネ ノ

title: Lesson 63 : Katakana ha hi fu he ho
text:
We have seen more than half of the 46 'simple' Katakana. Don't hesitate to review previous lessons.
Let's continue like this with 5 new characters: ハ ヒ フ ヘ ホ

title: Lesson 64 : Katakana ha hi fu he ho
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ハ ヒ フ ヘ ホ

title: Lesson 65 : Katakana ma mi mu me mo
text: Courage! Here are 5 new characters: マ ミ ム メ モ

title: Lesson 66 : Katakana ma mi mu me mo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: マ ミ ム メ モ

title: Lesson 67 : Katakana ya yu yo
text:
This time, 3 characters, they starting with 'y'.
Let's see that with this lesson: ヤ ユ ヨ

title: Lesson 68 : Katakana ya yu yo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ヤ ユ ヨ

title: Lesson 69 : Katakana ra ri ru re ro
text: You've learned some Katakana! Let's continue with katakana starting with 'r': ラ リ ル レ ロ

title: Lesson 70 : Katakana ra ri ru re ro
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ラ リ ル レ ロ

title: Lesson 71 : Katakana wa (w)o n
text: Here are last 3 characters of the 46 Gojuon Katakanas: ワ ヲ ン

title: Lesson 72 : Katakana wa (w)o n
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ワ ヲ ン

title: Lesson 73 : Katakana ga gi gu ge go
text:
We are done with 'simple' Katakana (Gojuon).
Continue with the first 5 characters of ((Han)dakuon) Katakana.
In addition they have two small lines (Dakuten) or a small circle (Handakuten).
Here k- becomes g-: ガ ギ グ ゲ ゴ

title: Lesson 74 : Katakana ga gi gu ge go
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ガ ギ グ ゲ ゴ

title: Lesson 75 : Katakana za ji zu ze zo
text:
Let's continue with 5 more (Han)dakuon characters.
Here s- becomes z-: ザ ジ ズ ゼ ゾ

title: Lesson 76 : Katakana za ji zu ze zo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ザ ジ ズ ゼ ゾ

title: Lesson 77 : Katakana da ji zu de do
text:
You have learned 10 new (Han)dakuon characters, let's continue with the next 5 characters.
Here t- becomes d-.
Also, pay attention to ジ(ji) and ヂ(ji*). And also to ズ(zu) and ヅ(zu*), they exist but are less used: ダ ヂ ヅ デ ド

title: Lesson 78 : Katakana da ji zu de do
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ダ ヂ ヅ デ ド

title: Lesson 79 : Katakana ba bi bu be bo
text:
Alright, let's continue with 5 new characters.
Here h- becomes b- with 'Dakuten' (small lines): バ ビ ブ ベ ボ

title: Lesson 80 : Katakana ba bi bu be bo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: バ ビ ブ ベ ボ

title: Lesson 81 : Katakana pa pi pu pe po
text: Here are the last 5 (Han)Dakuon Katakana. Here the h- become p- with 'Handakuten' (small circle): パ ピ プ ペ ポ

title: Lesson 82 : Katakana pa pi pu pe po
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: パ ピ プ ペ ポ

title: Lesson 83 : Katakana kya kyu kyo
text:
We have finished learning 'simple' (Gojuon) and (Han)dakuon Katakana.
Now we are going to see 'Yoon' Katakana.
Here are the first 3 characters.
These, are associations of Katakana キ(ki) with ヤ(ya), ユ(yu) and ヨ(yo): キャ キュ キョ

title: Lesson 84 : Katakana kya kyu kyo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: キャ キュ キョ

title: Lesson 85 : Katakana sha shu sho
text:
New lesson, new caracters.
Here are 3 additional characters to learn.
These, are associations of Katakana シ(shi) with Katakana ヤ(ya), ユ(yu) and ヨ(yo): シャ シュ ショ

title: Lesson 86 : Katakana sha shu sho
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: シャ シュ ショ

title: Lesson 87 : Katakana cha chu cho
text:
Do you remember all the previous Katakana?
Here are 3 additional characters to learn.
These, are associations of Katakana チ(chi) with ヤ(ya), ユ(yu) and ヨ(yo): チャ チュ チョ

title: Lesson 88 : Katakana cha chu cho
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: チャ チュ チョ

title: Lesson 89 : Katakana nya nyu nyo
text:
Let's keep learning, here are the next characters.
These, are associations of Katakana ニ(ni) with Katakana ヤ(ya), ユ(yu) and ヨ(yo): ニャ ニュ ニョ

title: Lesson 90 : Katakana nya nyu nyo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ニャ ニュ ニョ

title: Lesson 91 : Katakana hya hyu hyo
text:
You learned 12 Yoon. Continue with the following Katakana.
These, are associations of Katakana ヒ(hi) with Katakana ヤ(ya), ユ(yu) and ヨ(yo): ヒャ ヒュ ヒョ

title: Lesson 92 : Katakana hya hyu hyo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ヒャ ヒュ ヒョ

title: Lesson 93 : Katakana mya myu myo
text:
Let's continue with the following Katakana.
These, are associations of katakana ミ(mi) with katakana ヤ(ya), ユ(yu) and ヨ(yo): ミャ ミュ ミョ

title: Lesson 94 : Katakana mya myu myo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ミャ ミュ ミョ

title: Lesson 95 : Katakana rya ryu ryo
text:
Keep learning Katakana! Here are the next 3.
These, are associations of Katakana リ(ri) with ヤ(ya), ユ(yu) and ヨ(yo): リャ リュ リョ

title: Lesson 96 : Katakana rya ryu ryo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: リャ リュ リョ

title: Lesson 97 : Katakana gya gyu gyo
text:
You learned 21 Yoon, keep going.
These, are associations of Katakana ギ(gi) with Katakana ヤ(ya), ユ(yu) and ヨ(yo): ギャ ギュ ギョ

title: Lesson 98 : Katakana gya gyu gyo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ギャ ギュ ギョ

title: Lesson 99 : Katakana ja ju jo
text:
New lesson.
These, are associations of Katakana ジ(ji) with Katakana ヤ(ya), ユ(yu) and ヨ(yo): ジャ ジュ ジョ

title: Lesson 100 : Katakana ja ju jo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ジャ ジュ ジョ

title: Lesson 101 : Katakana bya byu byo
text:
You have seen almost all the Katakana. Let's continue with 3 more characters.
These, are associations of Katakana ビ(bi) with ヤ(ya), ユ(yu) and ヨ(yo): ビャ ビュ ビョ

title: Lesson 102 : Katakana bya byu byo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson: ビャ ビュ ビョ

title: Lesson 103 : Katakana pya pyu pyo
text:
Here is the last Katakana and so Kana.
These, are associations of Katakana ピ(pi) with Katakana ヤ(ya), ユ(yu) and ヨ(yo): ピャ ピュ ピョ

title: Lesson 104 : Katakana pya pyu pyo
text: In this lesson, let's see the writing of characters from previous lesson, after you can do as many quizzes as necessary to master all the usual Kana: ピャ ピュ ピョ
